entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ignace
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:36 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dryden Airport 09:19 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

Temperature: -14.9°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.4°C
Wind: N 21 km/h gust 39 km/h

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 13 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:15 AM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
